sql: SELECT 'secondary', lt_secondary, lt_lagtime_1 FROM sysha_lagtime
SELECT 'secondary', lt_secondary, lt_lagtime_1 FROM sysha_lagtime
SELECT 'chunk', chknum, pagesread FROM syschktab c, sysdbstab d WHERE c.dbsnum = d.dbsnum
SELECT 'chunk', chknum, pageswritten FROM syschktab c, sysdbstab d WHERE c.dbsnum = d.dbsnum
SELECT 'chunk', chknum, readtime FROM syschktab c, sysdbstab d WHERE c.dbsnum = d.dbsnum
SELECT 'chunk', chknum, writetime FROM syschktab c, sysdbstab d WHERE c.dbsnum = d.dbsnum

SELECT 'dbspace', name, 'state', 'used', SUM(chksize) - SUM(nfree) FROM sysdbspaces d, syschunks c WHERE d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4 UNION SELECT 'dbspace', name, 'state', 'free', SUM(nfree) FROM sysdbspaces d, syschunks c WHERE d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4
SELECT 'bufsize', bufsize, nbuffs FROM sysbufpool
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'seqscans'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'totalsorts'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'memsorts'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'disksorts'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'maxsortspace'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'iscommits'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'buffwts'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'ckptwts'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'lockreqs'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'lockwts'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'deadlks'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'fgwrites'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'lruwrites'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'chunkwrites'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'dskreads'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'bufreads'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'dskwrites'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'bufwrites'
SELECT value FROM sysprofile WHERE name = 'latchwts'
SELECT 'buffersize', bufsize, dskreads FROM sysbufpool
SELECT 'buffersize', bufsize, pagreads FROM sysbufpool
SELECT 'buffersize', bufsize, dskwrites FROM sysbufpool
SELECT 'buffersize', bufsize, pagwrites FROM sysbufpool
SELECT 'buffersize', bufsize, bufwaits FROM sysbufpool

SELECT 'waiter', '0' (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM syslocks WHERE waiter IS NULL AND dbsname != 'sysmaster' AND tabname != 'sysdatabases') FROM sysdual UNION ALL SELECT 'waiter', '1' (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM syslocks WHERE waiter IS NOT NULL AND dbsname != 'sysmaster' AND tabname != 'sysdatabases') FROM sysdual
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysseglst WHERE seg_class = 2
SELECT SUM(seg_blkused) * 4096 FROM sysseglst WHERE seg_class = 2
SELECT SUM(vp_cache_size) * 4096 FROM sysvplst
SELECT SUM(po_usedamt) FROM syspools WHERE po_class = 2
SELECT 'poolname', po_name, SUM(po_usedamt) FROM syspools WHERE po_class = 2 AND po_name IN ('dictpool', 'global', 'mt', 'rsam', 'aio', 'dstpool', 'procpool') GROUP BY 1, 2
SELECT 'class', classname, COUNT(*) - SUM(num_ready) FROM sysvplst GROUP BY 1, 2
SELECT 'class', classname, SUM(num_ready) FROM sysvplst GROUP BY 1, 2
SELECT 'class', classname, SUM(total_semops) FROM sysvplst GROUP BY 1, 2
SELECT 'class', classname, SUM(total_busy_wts) FROM sysvplst GROUP BY 1, 2
SELECT 'class', classname, SUM(total_spins) FROM sysvplst GROUP BY 1, 2
SELECT 'state', 'user', 'class', class, SUM(usercpu) FROM sysvpprof GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4 UNION SELECT 'state', 'system', 'class', class, SUM(syscpu) FROM sysvpprof GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4
SELECT sh_curtime FROM sysshmvals
SELECT sh_boottime FROM sysshmvals
SELECT sh_pfclrtime FROM sysshmvals

SELECT UNIQUE 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, b.ti_rowsize FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT UNIQUE 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, b.ti_ncols FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT UNIQUE 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, b.ti_nkeys FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, SUM(b.ti_nextns) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT UNIQUE 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, b.ti_pagesize FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, SUM(b.ti_nptotal) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, SUM(b.ti_npused) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, SUM(b.ti_npdata) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, SUM(b.ti_nptotal - b.ti_npused) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, SUM(b.ti_nrows) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

help: Table number of rows per page
sql: SELECT UNIQUE 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, CASE WHEN b.ti_rowsize > 0 THEN TRUNC((b.ti_pagesize - 24) / b.ti_rowsize) ELSE 0 END CASE FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT UNIQUE 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, CASE WHEN b.ti_rowsize > 0 THEN TRUNC((b.ti_pagesize - 24) / b.ti_rowsize) * (b.ti_nptotal - b.ti_npused) ELSE 0 END CASE FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT 'database', a.dbsname, 'table', a.tabname, MIN(b.ti_created) FROM systabnames a, systabinfo b WHERE b.ti_partnum = a.partnum AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND a.dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 AND a.tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*'

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(lockreqs)  FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(lockwts)  FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(deadlks) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(lktouts) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(isreads) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(iswrites) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(isrewrites) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(isdeletes) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(bufreads) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(bufwrites) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(seqscans) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(pagreads) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4

SELECT 'database', dbsname, 'table', tabname, SUM(pagwrites) FROM systabinfo b, sysptprof c WHERE b.ti_partnum = c.partnum AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'sb*' AND dbsname NOT MATCHES 'tmp*' AND tabname NOT MATCHES 'sys*' AND b.ti_npdata > 0 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4
